1370: Euerardus was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
Got married to Gheesen at age 32 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Gheesen, Herbert, at age 33.
1372: Had a son with Gheesen, Bartrarde, at age 34.
1375: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Sophia, at age 37.
1376: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Brundonis, at age 38.
1380: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Erkenradis, at age 42.
1381: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Lisebette, at age 43.
Lost daughter Lisebette when Lisebette was 1 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Heile, at age 44.
1386: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Natelien, at age 48.
